language_description: Choose the language in which you want to use FinWiseAI. The interface and conversations will be adapted accordingly.
language_support_description: FinWiseAI supports multiple languages to ensure our services are accessible to all users. Our AI Branch Manager can converse in different Indian languages, making the loan application process more comfortable.
feature_interface: Interface translations to navigate the application
feature_conversations: AI conversations in your preferred language
feature_accents: Support for regional accents and dialects
view_application_decision: View your loan application decision and next steps
branch_manager_description: Apply for loans through video conversations without the hassle of paperwork or branch visits.
loan_application_description: Begin a video conversation with our AI Branch Manager
upload_documents_description: Submit Aadhaar, PAN, or income proof via camera or upload
check_eligibility_description: See if you qualify for our loan products
financial_planning_description: Get personalized financial advice and planning
home_loan_conversation: Video conversation about home loan options
personal_loan_description: Flexible funding for any personal need
business_loan_description: Grow your business with flexible capital
vehicle_loan_description: Finance your new car or two-wheeler
gold_loan_description: Quick loans against your gold assets
